law.catch_line: ** IN EFFECT UNTIL OCTOBER 1, 2013 PER CHAPTER 570 OF 2012**...
law.text:
** IN EFFECT UNTIL OCTOBER 1, 2013 PER CHAPTER 570 OF 2012**
An employer may not with fraudulent intent misrepresent to the Board the wages on which a premium under this subtitle is based.
A person who violates any provision of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 90 days or both.
